title: New Client Release?
body:
Just wondering how long would everything take when would it reach live. Next month? Next Year?
I know there's no definite date and that its too hard to say when, but we can rule out 10 years, right? right? Won't be 10 years I hope. I like this new client and all, it looks good, but I want to know generally when to expect it, would it be here this season? Next season? Just a general idea would be great.

replies.body:
I don't expect the finish build of the client anytime soon. Right now, the client is very 'bare' on its own â€” not all features have been implemented yet, and when they are, a lot testing and bugfixing will need to be done.

{{champion:17}}
I'm pretty sure it would have to be six months at the shortest, it'll probably take longer than that though.
